COMMAND.name: mclag
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG

COMMAND.name: mclag domain
COMMAND.help: Enter MCLAG domain configuration mode

COMMAND.name: no mclag domain
COMMAND.help: Remove MCLAG domain

COMMAND.name: mclag gateway-mac
COMMAND.help: Configure gateway MAC for router ports over MCLAG

COMMAND.name: no mclag gateway-mac
COMMAND.help: Remove gateway mac for router ports over MCLAG

COMMAND.name: show configuration
COMMAND.help: Show configuration

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: Disable or reset configuration

COMMAND.name: source-ip
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG session source IP address

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures MCLAG session's source ip address
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure/change MCLAG session's source ip address

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG session source ip address for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no source-ip
COMMAND.help: Remove MCLAG session source IP address

COMMAND.name: peer-ip
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG session peer IP address

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures MCLAG session's peer IP address
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure/change MCLAG session's peer ip address

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG peer ip address for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no peer-ip
COMMAND.help: Remove MCLAG session peer IP Address

COMMAND.name: peer-link
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG peer interface

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to configure/change MCLAG session's peer link

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG peer link for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no peer-link
COMMAND.help: Remove MCLAG peer interface

COMMAND.name: mclag-system-mac
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG system MAC address

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to set MCLAG system mac which will be used for MCLAG interface mac

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG system mac address for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no mclag-system-mac
COMMAND.help: Revert back to default MCLAG system MAC address

COMMAND.name: keepalive-interval
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG Session Keepalive interaval in secs

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures MCLAG keepalive interval in seconds
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to change the default MCLAG keepalive interval

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG session interval to 10 for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no keepalive-interval
COMMAND.help: Revert back to default MCLAG keepalive interval

COMMAND.name: session-timeout
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG Session Timeout in secs

PARAM.name: ST
PARAM.help: MCLAG Session Timeout value in secs

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures MCLAG session timeout value in seconds
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to change the default MCLAG session timeout

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG session timeout value to 100 seconds for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no session-timeout
COMMAND.help: Revert back to default mclag Session Timeout

COMMAND.name: delay-restore
COMMAND.help: Configure MCLAG delay restore time

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configures MCLAG delay restore time in seconds
DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to change the default MCLAG delay restore time

EXAMPLE.summary: Configures MCLAG delay restore time to 180 seconds for MCLAG domain 100

COMMAND.name: no delay-restore
COMMAND.help: Revert back to default MCLAG delay restore time

DOCGEN.USAGE: Use this command to delete MCLAG delay restore time previously configured

COMMAND.name: show mclag
COMMAND.help: Show MCLAG domain

COMMAND.name: show mclag brief
COMMAND.help: Show MCLAG domain/interface information

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Show command to display MCLAG domain summary
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli# show mclag brief
Domain ID : 10 Role : Session Status : Peer Link Status : Source Address : 1.1.1.1 Peer Address : Peer Link : Eth1/12/1 Keepalive Interval : 1 secs Session Timeout : 30 secs Delay Restore : 300 secs System Mac : Mclag System Mac : 00:bb:bb:bb:cc:cc
Number of MLAG Interfaces:1 ----------------------------------------------------------- MLAG Interface Local/Remote Status ----------------------------------------------------------- PortChannel10 down/down

COMMAND.name: show mclag interface
COMMAND.help: Show MCLAG interface information

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Show command to display MCLAG interface inforamation
DOCGEN.USAGE: sonic-cli# show mclag interface PortchannelId DomainId
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic-cli# show mclag 10 100 Local/Remote Status : down/down TrafficDisable : No IsolateWithPeerLink : No

COMMAND.name: show mclag separate-ip-interfaces
COMMAND.help: Show MCLAG separate IP interface information

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Show command to display Vlan interfaces on which MCLAG separate IP is configured.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli# show mclag separate-ip-interfaces
Interface Name =================== Vlan10 =================== Total count : 1 ===================

COMMAND.name: show mclag peer-gateway-interfaces
COMMAND.help: Shows MCLAG Peer Gateway interface information

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Show command to display Vlan interfaces on which MCLAG Peer Gateway is configured.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic-cli# show mclag peer-gateway-interfaces
Interface Name =================== Vlan10 =================== Total count : 1 ===================

COMMAND.name: show running-configuration mclag
COMMAND.help: Show current mclag configuration

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows running configuration of mclag domain
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic# show running-configuration mclag mclag domain 89 source-ip 1.1.1.1 peer-ip 1.1.1.2 peer-link PortChannel2 keepalive-interval 1 session-timeout 30
